text: Zomergem is a former municipality in the Belgian province of East Flanders. On 1 January 2019, Lovendegem, Waarschoot and Zomergem were merged into the new municipality of Lievegem. In 2007, 8,003 people lived there. It is at 51° 07 North, 03° 33 East. == References == Category:Former municipalities of East Flanders
title: Zomergem
